channel.title: Descent being recreated in UDK
channel.description:
Just stumbled across this, for early work he seems to have quite a bit down gameplay wise
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OxOxiOQ4sXU&feature=plcp[/url]
If you want to find out more, or provide help in any way, go to this link [url]https://descent.silverball-magic.com/[/url]
I myself am considering helping him out with the modelling aspect

item.title: Descent being recreated in UDK
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
It got an article on RPS

https://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2012/11/01/no-downside-modder-remaking-descent-in-ue3/

I emailed the guy and he responded, I’ll probably be making new for him for the assets. At least it’s not human faces, because I can’t do them yet

Read full topic

item.title: Descent being recreated in UDK
item.dc:creator: Maxx_Skywalker
item.description:
That’d be awesome to see that come to fruition.

Read full topic
